info.name: Complete E-commerce API Collection - Admin & Customer
info.description: Complete collection of admin and customer API endpoints for e-commerce platform with centralized users system and JWT authentication

request.description: Check if the API is running and healthy
Login as admin user. Demo credentials: admin/admin123, manager/manager123, staff/staff123
Verify if the admin token is valid
Refresh the admin JWT token
Get admin user profile information
Logout admin user
Request OTP for mobile number authentication
Validate OTP and get JWT token. Demo OTP: 1234. Creates user automatically if not exists.
Verify if the customer token is valid
Refresh the customer JWT token
Logout customer user
Get paginated list of all products with filtering and sorting
Get specific product details by ID
Create a new product
Update existing product details
Update product stock quantity. Operations: set, add, subtract
Delete a product
Get paginated list of all categories
Create a new category
Update existing category
Delete a category
Get paginated list of all subcategories with filtering
Get specific subcategory details by ID
Create a new subcategory
Update existing subcategory details
Delete a subcategory
Get all subcategories for a specific category
Bulk update multiple subcategories
Get paginated list of all departments
Create a new department
Update existing department
Delete a department
Get statistics for all departments
Get paginated list of all orders with filtering
Update order status (pending, confirmed, preparing, ready, delivered, cancelled)
Update payment status (pending, paid, failed)
Get comprehensive order statistics
Get paginated list of all payments with filtering
Update payment status (completed, pending, failed, refunded)
Process a refund for a payment
Get comprehensive payment statistics
Get paginated list of all payment modes
Get specific payment mode details by ID
Create a new payment mode
Update existing payment mode
Delete a payment mode
Get paginated list of all users with filtering
Get specific user details by ID
Create a new user
Update existing user details
Delete a user
Bulk update multiple users
Get comprehensive user statistics
Get authenticated customer's profile information
Update customer profile information (name, email)
Add a new delivery address for the customer
Get all delivery addresses for the authenticated customer
Add or remove a product from customer's favorites
Get all favorite products for the authenticated customer
Get paginated list of all banners from banners collection. API returns transformed data with generated banner_title and banner_description based on database fields.

Create a new banner in banners collection. banner_title and banner_description are optional (API generates them). Required: banner_image_url. Maps to database fields: banner_image_url→banner_img, banner_link→redirect_link, banner_type_id→banner_type_id (numeric), is_active→"Enabled"/"Disabled"

Update existing banner in banners collection. Only include fields you want to update. Field mappings: banner_image_url→banner_img, banner_link→redirect_link, banner_type_id→banner_type_id (numeric), is_active→"Enabled"/"Disabled"
Get specific banner details by ID from banners collection. Returns transformed data with generated banner_title and banner_description.
Delete a banner from banners collection. Returns transformed banner data in the response.

Bulk update multiple banners in banners collection. Field mappings apply: banner_image_url→banner_img, banner_link→redirect_link, banner_type_id→banner_type_id (numeric), is_active→"Enabled"/"Disabled"
Get active banners (is_active='Enabled') from banners collection. Returns transformed data for frontend compatibility. Supports filtering by banner_type_id and store_code.
Get paginated list of all delivery slots
Get specific delivery slot details by ID
Create a new delivery slot for a store (use HH:MM:SS format)
Update existing delivery slot details
Delete a delivery slot
Get paginated list of all pincodes with their associated stores
Get specific pincode details with its associated stores
Create a new basic pincode entry (without store details)
Update basic pincode details (use Update Store for outlet information)
Delete a pincode and all its associated stores/outlets

body.raw:
{
  "pincode": "400001",
  "store_code": "MUM",
  "mobile_outlet_name": "Andheri Store",
  "store_address": "123 Main Street, Andheri, Mumbai, Maharashtra",
  "min_order_amount": 500,
  "store_open_time": "9 am to 10 pm",
  "store_delivery_time": "Day + 1 day",
  "store_offer_name": "Upto 50% Off",
  "latitude": "19.1136",
  "longitude": "72.8697",
  "home_delivery": "yes",
  "self_pickup": "no",
  "store_message": "We are not accepting any Online Order, sorry for inconvenience",
  "contact_number": "9876543210",
  "email": "support@patelrpl.net",
  "whatsappnumber": "9876543210",
  "is_enabled": true
}

request.description: Create a new store/outlet for an existing pincode (pincode must exist first)
Get all stores/outlets for a specific pincode
Update store/outlet details
Delete a store/outlet
Bulk update multiple pincodes (basic pincode settings only)
Check if a pincode is serviceable (must have enabled pincode and at least one enabled store)
